definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle
to confine/to lock up/to pen in

sentences.english: This planet, we think, is likely to have a fairly  substantial atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 我們認爲，這顆行星可能具有相當厚密的大氣圈。

sentences.english: These scientists pay close attention to the changes in the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 這幾位科學家密切關注着大氣圈的變化。

sentences.english: The atmosphere is a continuous layer of gases.
sentences.chinese: 大氣圈是連續的氣體層。
